General.Name: Kumkang Kind Co Ltd
General.Description: Kumkang Kind Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel pipes and various scaffolding products in South Korea, Malaysia, the United States, Vietnam, India, East Africa, Indonesia, and internationally. The company offers aluminium formwork systems; gang formwork systems; climbing systems for residential, commercial, and civil engineering projects; civil engineering formwork systems; and euro formwork systems, as well as customer support solutions. It also provides steel pipes, aluminium billets and extrusions, scaffolding and shoring systems, and modular unit systems. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
